document_data.mainbody:
he Unyielding Sword was a small mercenary company in Skullport in 1379 DR.Derek Myers. "Eyes on The Ball." Dungeon #206. Renton, WA Wizards of the Coast, September 2012.  
The Unyielding Sword often procured slaves for the slaver Lanador.
In 1379 DR, Lanador hired Eldreth and his men to kidnap ten elves from Waterdeeps streets. Unfortunately, unknown to them, one of them was one of the Agents of the Eye. So the Xanathar supported an adventuring party to enter the Lanadors lair. Many of the Unyielding Sword were there and were killed in the fighting.Derek Myers. "Eyes on The Ball." Dungeon #206. Renton, WA Wizards of the Coast, September 2012.
